sparqldl

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • sparqldl.Query
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryImpl

    public abstract class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    The Query class represents a SPARQL-DL query and mainly contains query atoms.
